downloadTitle: Windows Server 2012 Essentials Assessment and Deployment Kit
downloadDescription: The Windows® Server 2012 Essentials Assessment and Deployment Kit (ADK) is a collection of tools and binaries that you can use to customize, assess, and deploy Windows Server 2012 Essentials on new computers.

downloadFile.name: Windows Server 2012 Essentials Assessment and Deployment Kit_EULA 8-28-12.rtf
downloadFile.url: https://download.microsoft.com/download/4/7/d/47daa480-604a-4dc0-a185-1e735ab4ccd0/Windows Server 2012 Essentials Assessment and Deployment Kit_EULA 8-28-12.rtf

detailsSection: The Windows® Server 2012 Essentials Assessment and Deployment Kit (ADK) is a collection of tools and binaries that you can use to customize, assess, and deploy Windows Server 2012 Essentials on new computers.
detailsSection_file_name: Windows Server 2012 Essentials Assessment and Deployment Kit_EULA 8-28-12.rtf
installInstructionSection:
Please download and save the Windows Server 2012 Essentials Assessment and Deployment Kit to your local hard disk. You must review the license terms. You must download, read, and agree to the enclosed license terms before installing and using the software.

For more information, please see the following:
Windows Server 2012 Essentials ADK documentation
Windows Server 2012 Tech Center
